LanguageData.CultIncident_StarsAreWrong.label: stars are wrong
LanguageData.CultIncident_StarsAreWrong.letterText: Unbound to the proper order of the cosmos, the stars themselves seem to sting our eyes with a hateful scorn.
LanguageData.CultIncident_StarsAreRight.label: stars are right
LanguageData.CultIncident_StarsAreRight.letterText: The planets of the system have aligned. Otherworldly bodies seem to call to your colonists.
LanguageData.CultSeedIncident_TreeOfNightmares.label: Tree of Nightmares
LanguageData.CultSeedIncident_TreeOfNightmares.letter: It gazes through the souls of all that pass it.
LanguageData.CultSeedIncident_NightmareMonolith.label: Monolith
LanguageData.CultSeedIncident_NightmareMonolith.lette: It gazes through the souls of all that pass it.
LanguageData.Cults_BastSpellFavor.label: Favor
LanguageData.Cults_BastSpellFavor.description: Make a sacrifice without any worldly gains.
LanguageData.Cults_BastSpellFavor.letterText: felt a supernatural presence connect with them from beyond space and time
LanguageData.Cults_BastSpellInspiration.label: Divine Inspiration
LanguageData.Cults_BastSpellInspiration.description: Bast smiles upon your colonists, bestowing a random acts of inspiration upon them all
LanguageData.Cults_BastSpellFelineAspect.label: Feline Aspect
LanguageData.Cults_BastSpellFelineAspect.description: Trasforms your preacher with feline grace and claws.
LanguageData.Cults_BastSpellFelineAspect.letterText: watches as their fingernails turn to claws and can now feel their newfound unnatural agility
LanguageData.Cults_BastSpellSummonGuardian.label: Summon Guardian
LanguageData.Cults_BastSpellSummonGuardian.descriptio: Transform a beloved feline into a guardian.
LanguageData.Cults_BastSpellSummonGuardian.letterLabe: and have them smite your foes
LanguageData.Cults_BastSpellSummonGuardian.letterText: sees that your pet is absorbed in a flash of lite and is transformed into a ferocious beast
LanguageData.Cults_BastSpellSanctuary.label: Sanctuary
LanguageData.Cults_BastSpellSanctuary.description: Protects your settlement from most hostiles
LanguageData.Cults_BastSpellSanctuary.letterLabel: may your enemies flee in futility
LanguageData.Cults_BastSpellSanctuary.letterText: sighs in relief as your enemies flee
LanguageData.Cults_BastSpellPassageToAaru.label: Passage to A'aru
LanguageData.Cults_BastSpellPassageToAaru.description: [Game Ending Spell]\nThe small settlement is deemed worthy by Bast to enter A'aru.
LanguageData.Cults_BastSpellPassageToAaru.letterLabel: and cry out in supplication that she may gaze upon your small settlement and deem you worthy
LanguageData.Cults_BastSpellPassageToAaru.letterText: dons a mask and so is free
LanguageData.Cults_SpellFavor.label: Favor
LanguageData.Cults_SpellFavor.description: Make a sacrifice without any worldly gains.
LanguageData.Cults_SpellFavor.letterText: felt a supernatural presence connect with them from beyond space and time
LanguageData.Cults_SpellPsionicGrowth.label: Psionic Growth
LanguageData.Cults_SpellPsionicGrowth.description: Generates a tumorous growth within the brain of the colonist granting them a powerful psionic melee attack.
LanguageData.Cults_SpellPsionicGrowth.letterLabel: to be endowed with psychic power
LanguageData.Cults_SpellPsionicGrowth.letterText: felt an intense pressure in their skull and looked on the world with new and strange eyes
LanguageData.Cults_SpellAspectOfCthulhu.label: Aspect of Cthulhu
LanguageData.Cults_SpellAspectOfCthulhu.description: The spell targets one of your colonists and remanifests one of their limbs as a powerful tentacle.
LanguageData.Cults_SpellAspectOfCthulhu.letterLabel: to be endowed with otherworldly parts
LanguageData.Cults_SpellAspectOfCthulhu.letterText: looked around nervously to find who had been endowed with Cthulhu's blessings
LanguageData.Cults_SpellOrbitalInsanityWave.label: Orbital Insanity Wave
LanguageData.Cults_SpellOrbitalInsanityWave.descripti: Causes a massive wave through the orbital layer of the region. This will cause ships to crash in the vicinity.
LanguageData.Cults_SpellOrbitalInsanityWave.letterLab: to send his dreams into the void as a beacon to those who pass
LanguageData.Cults_SpellOrbitalInsanityWave.letterTex: felt Cthulhu reach out and draw in vessels for your plunder
LanguageData.Cults_SpellTerrestrialInsanityWave.label: Terrestrial Insanity Wave
LanguageData.Cults_SpellTerrestrialInsanityWave.descr: Causes a massive wave through the terrestrial layer of the region. All enemy humanoid pawns will be riddled with a crippling form of insanity.
LanguageData.Cults_SpellTerrestrialInsanityWave.lette: and ask that he sends your foes into disarray
cries out with victorious glee as Cthulhu sends their enemies deep into madness
LanguageData.Cults_SpellAwakenCthulhu.label: Awaken Cthulhu
LanguageData.Cults_SpellAwakenCthulhu.description: [Game Ending Spell]\nThe effects of Cthulhu’s awakening are unknown.
LanguageData.Cults_SpellAwakenCthulhu.letterLabel: to awaken him from his eon long slumber and start his reign over the physical world
LanguageData.Cults_SpellAwakenCthulhu.letterText: feels a clawing at their mind as the great Cthulhu awakens. Realities' skin stretches thinner and thinner.
LanguageData.Cults_SpellSunkenShip.label: Sunken Ship
LanguageData.Cults_SpellSunkenShip.description: Delivers an ancient wreck from a distant seabed to your colony that can provide wood, steel, plasteel, and components when dismantled.
LanguageData.Cults_SpellSunkenShip.letterLabel: out of desperation or greed, to deliver wealth from the sea
LanguageData.Cults_SpellSunkenShip.letterText: is granted a vision of mists unveiling a wreckage from the sea
LanguageData.Cults_SpellTreasuresOfTheDeep.label: Treasures of the Deep
LanguageData.Cults_SpellTreasuresOfTheDeep.descriptio: Brings forth lost treasure chests filled with valuable resources such as jade, silver, and gold from ancient ships lost to the abyssal seas.
LanguageData.Cults_SpellTreasuresOfTheDeep.letterLabe: out of desperation or greed, to deliver wealth from the sea
LanguageData.Cults_SpellTreasuresOfTheDeep.letterText: later finds chests of treasure with only damp handprints as evidence of those who left it
LanguageData.Cults_SpellDefendTheBrood.label: Defend the Brood
LanguageData.Cults_SpellDefendTheBrood.description: Brings a gang of deep ones to stand guard over your colony. Placement of the Sign of Dagon before casting this spell is recommended.
LanguageData.Cults_SpellDefendTheBrood.letterLabel: and ask that he protect his own
LanguageData.Cults_SpellDefendTheBrood.letterText: hears a croaking off in the distance. And then another, and then a chorus
LanguageData.Cults_SpellBountyOfTheSea.label: Bounty of the Sea
LanguageData.Cults_SpellBountyOfTheSea.description: Dagon tears a ship from the surface of a distant ocean and delivers its fresh corpse.
LanguageData.Cults_SpellBountyOfTheSea.letterLabel: out of desperation or greed, to deliver wealth from the sea
LanguageData.Cults_SpellBountyOfTheSea.letterText: hears a crash, then screaming, as the prize is delivered
LanguageData.Cults_SpellOrthogenesis.label: Orthogenesis
LanguageData.Cults_SpellOrthogenesis.description: [Game Ending Spell]\nA path to the great cities of the Deep Ones will be revealed to your colony, and they can begin the merger with the Deep Ones and become one with Dagon’s flock.
LanguageData.Cults_SpellOrthogenesis.letterLabel: to deliver his blessing and grants an invitation to join him
LanguageData.Cults_SpellOrthogenesis.letterText: hears the call, a long and deep croak, roll over the land. A call beckoning them back to the sea
LanguageData.Cults_SpellFertility.label: Fertility Ritual
LanguageData.Cults_SpellFertility.description: Summons a fertility totem to support your colony’s fields through hard times.
LanguageData.Cults_SpellFertility.letterText: witnesses fully formed black goats and a totem rising from the remains of the sacrifice
LanguageData.Cults_SpellMotherOfGoats.label: Mother Of Goats
LanguageData.Cults_SpellMotherOfGoats.description: Summons a herd of black goats to provide your hunters with ample prey to hunt.
LanguageData.Cults_SpellMotherOfGoats.letterText: can hear the wild screams of goats in the distance
LanguageData.Cults_SpellTransmogrifyPets.label: Transmogrify Pets
LanguageData.Cults_SpellTransmogrifyPets.description: Allow Shub-Niggurath to reseed the genetic structure of your beloved pet with extra-dimensional code worthy of Shub-Niggurath’s own spawn.
LanguageData.Cults_SpellTransmogrifyPets.letterLabel: to bless their beasts with a touch of its extra-dimensional biology
LanguageData.Cults_SpellTransmogrifyPets.letterText: looks on as the skin of the chosen creature bulges and writhes with the ongoing changes beneath. It returns the gaze and bleats impassively
LanguageData.Cults_SpellWombBetweenWorlds.label: Womb Between Worlds
LanguageData.Cults_SpellWombBetweenWorlds.description: Summons a portal that spews Dark Young monsters to serve you as their loyal master until Shub-Niggurath deems otherwise.
LanguageData.Cults_SpellWombBetweenWorlds.letterText: beholds vine-like tentacles erupt from the ground. The earth heaves and splits open as it gives birth to a new monstrous form
LanguageData.Cults_SpellTransdimensionalConvergence.d: [Game Ending Spell]\nAllow Shub-Niggurath to enter this dimension fully-formed at the cost of mutating the biology of your entire region.
LanguageData.Cults_SpellTransdimensionalConvergence.l: and attempt to break down the barriers and open the way
rends the barriers and unfolds the higher dimensions, bringing the Mother Goddess into this lowly place
LanguageData.Cults_SpellStarryWisdom.label: Starry Wisdom
LanguageData.Cults_SpellStarryWisdom.description: Transforms your executioner’s mind into a psychopathic one. Psychopaths will also be turned cannibalistic.
LanguageData.Cults_SpellStarryWisdom.letterLabel: and give the dark one its toll of dreams in exchange for illumination
LanguageData.Cults_SpellStarryWisdom.letterText: has their mind open to the truth
LanguageData.Cults_SpellForbiddenKnowledge.label: Forbidden Knowledge
LanguageData.Cults_SpellForbiddenKnowledge.descriptio: Grants a sizable bonus to your current research project.
LanguageData.Cults_SpellForbiddenKnowledge.letterLabe: and ask that he grants forbidden knowledge
LanguageData.Cults_SpellForbiddenKnowledge.letterText: hears dark secrets scratched in the air by a whisper
LanguageData.Cults_SpellChaosTheory.label: Chaos Theory
LanguageData.Cults_SpellChaosTheory.description: Accept a deal from Nyarlathotep to live one’s life again. This removes all incapabilities from the executioner and changes their entire backstory.
LanguageData.Cults_SpellChaosTheory.letterLabel: and petition for another chance to correct mistakes from the past
LanguageData.Cults_SpellChaosTheory.letterText: is sent back in time to before their birth to relive their life again
LanguageData.Cults_SpellDarkEmissary.label: Dark Emissary
LanguageData.Cults_SpellDarkEmissary.description: A new cult member joins your colony.
LanguageData.Cults_SpellDarkEmissary.letterLabel: to bolster your ranks with his favoured
LanguageData.Cults_SpellPilgrimageToKadath.label: Pilgrimage to Kadath
LanguageData.Cults_SpellPilgrimageToKadath.descriptio: [Game Ending Spell]\nWill you join Nyarlathotep in the dreamworld?
LanguageData.Cults_SpellPilgrimageToKadath.letterLabe: and ask that he illuminate the path to one of his many thrones
LanguageData.Cults_SpellPilgrimageToKadath.letterText: finds themselves at the start of a long path, with a stranger ahead, beckoning
LanguageData.Cults_SpellTheKingInYellow.label: The King in Yellow, Act I
LanguageData.Cults_SpellTheKingInYellow.description: Acquire a reproduction of the infamous play, "The King in Yellow." Those exposed to the contents therin are downed and become cult-minded instantly.
LanguageData.Cults_SpellTheKingInYellow.letterLabel: and petition him to whisper the tale of the the Visitor, who wears no mask, and the doom that followed
LanguageData.Cults_SpellTheKingInYellow.letterText: smiles with eagerness. They cannot wait to see how the play ends this time
LanguageData.Cults_SpellSummonByakhee.label: Summon Byakhee
LanguageData.Cults_SpellSummonByakhee.description: Summon a byakhee for defense and transport.
LanguageData.Cults_SpellSummonByakhee.letterLabel: and beseech that he sends one of his hideous star-dwelling steeds
LanguageData.Cults_SpellSummonByakhee.letterText: hears unearthly screams and the beating of leathery wings from above
LanguageData.Cults_SpellVisionsOfCarcosa.label: The King in Yellow, Act II
LanguageData.Cults_SpellVisionsOfCarcosa.description: A proportion of the inhabitants will fall to dream of the lost city of Carcosa for 5-6 hours and shall awaken deeply calmed for a season.
LanguageData.Cults_SpellVisionsOfCarcosa.letterLabel: and petition him for visions of the spires and balustrades of the distant and lost city of Carcosa
LanguageData.Cults_SpellVisionsOfCarcosa.letterText: feels the tendrils of sleep weave its way into their mind, to pull them away to distant Haydes, where Carcosa sits under black stars
LanguageData.Cults_SpellUnspeakableOath.label: Unspeakable Oath
LanguageData.Cults_SpellUnspeakableOath.description: When the oathtaker dies, they return to life once again to serve.
LanguageData.Cults_SpellUnspeakableOath.letterLabel: to swear an unbreakable oath in his name
LanguageData.Cults_SpellUnspeakableOath.letterText: realises that they are the only one who notices the masked stranger, slender in their yellow robes, and realises that their life is no longer their own
LanguageData.Cults_SpellAbsorptionByCarcosa.label: Absorption by Carcosa
LanguageData.Cults_SpellAbsorptionByCarcosa.descripti: [Game Ending Spell]\nThe small settlement is deemed worthy by Hastur to enter his realm and be absorbed by the city of Carcosa.
LanguageData.Cults_SpellAbsorptionByCarcosa.letterLab: and cry out in supplication that he may gaze upon your small settlement and deem you worthy
LanguageData.Cults_SpellAbsorptionByCarcosa.letterTex: dons a mask and so is free
LanguageData.Cults_SpellSleeperOfNKai.label: Sleeper of N'Kai
LanguageData.Cults_SpellSleeperOfNKai.description: Summons an unspeakably deformed idol that luls raiders to sleep.
LanguageData.Cults_SpellSleeperOfNKai.letterLabel: to satiate his hunger in exchange for a totem of power
LanguageData.Cults_SpellSleeperOfNKai.letterText: beholds tar-black tendrils ooze through the ground and pool into a small figure. which radiates a hypnotizing gaze shaded with an unnerving hunger
LanguageData.Cults_SpellBlackIchor.label: Black Ichor
LanguageData.Cults_SpellBlackIchor.description: Brings forth savory black ichor to satiate your colonists' gluttony and improve their mood.
LanguageData.Cults_SpellBlackIchor.letterLabel: and request for aid in fulfilling their own appetites
LanguageData.Cults_SpellBlackIchor.letterText: hears strange whispers from below as unearthly basins fill with black ooze from the earth
LanguageData.Cults_SpellFormlessSpawn.label: Summon Formless Spawn
LanguageData.Cults_SpellFormlessSpawn.description: Pull forth from the earth, the ichor-formed spawn of Tsathoggua to serve your colony.
LanguageData.Cults_SpellFormlessSpawn.letterLabel: and persuade him to lend a servant in exchange
LanguageData.Cults_SpellFormlessSpawn.letterText: sees the black ichor explode with writhing ferocity -- is it truly alive?
LanguageData.Cults_SpellElixerOfPower.label: Elixir of Power
LanguageData.Cults_SpellElixerOfPower.description: Bring forth a special ichor for mortal consumption that will bestow incredible power.
LanguageData.Cults_SpellElixerOfPower.letterLabel: and barters souls for incredible power
LanguageData.Cults_SpellElixerOfPower.letterText: sees a special ichor flow from the walls, into a small vessel, pulsating with pangs of a great hunger and untold power
LanguageData.Cults_SpellCallToDarkness.label: Call to Darkness
LanguageData.Cults_SpellCallToDarkness.description: [Game Ending Spell]\nRepay your debts by heeding the call to darkness.
LanguageData.Cults_SpellCallToDarkness.letterLabel: and yell for the final break of the earth to bring the cult to their master
LanguageData.Cults_SpellCallToDarkness.letterText: instead of making the sleeper rise, breaks the foundations of the world, and causes a great collapse that brings the mortal realm beneath the unmoving toad god
LanguageData.Cults_SpellDoubleTheFun.label: Double The Fun
LanguageData.Cults_SpellDoubleTheFun.letterText: A freak localized flashstorm is striking a small area with lightning. This can cause massive fires.
LanguageData.Cults_SpellReanimator.label: Reanimator
LanguageData.Cults_SpellReanimator.letterText: Your sacrifice has risen from the dead
LanguageData.Cults_SpellFlashstorm.label: Flashstorm
LanguageData.Cults_SpellFlashstorm.letterText: A freak localized flashstorm is striking a small area with lightning. This can cause massive fires.
LanguageData.Cults_SpellEcstaticFrenzy.label: Ecstatic Frenzy
LanguageData.Cults_SpellEcstaticFrenzy.letterText: Through the fervor of their ritual, your cultists have gone wild, thrashing at one another like animals
LanguageData.Cults_SpellStarVampireVisit.label: Summoned Star Vampire
LanguageData.Cults_SpellStarVampireVisit.letterText: A star vampire pierces the veil of our reality
LanguageData.Cults_SpellBlight.label: Blight
LanguageData.Cults_SpellNoLongerDomesticated.label: No Longer Domesticated
LanguageData.Cults_SpellNoLongerDomesticated.letterTe: Some of your animals have gone feral with madness
LanguageData.Cults_SpellEclipse.label: Eclipse
LanguageData.Cults_SpellEclipse.letterText: Unseen forces have forced one of the moons of this planet in front of the sun. An eclipse has begun
LanguageData.Cults_SpellFoodSpoilage.label: Food Spoilage
LanguageData.Cults_SpellFoodSpoilage.letterText: Some of your food stores have mysteriously become rotten and inedible
LanguageData.Cults_SpellReincarnation.label: Reincarnation
LanguageData.Cults_SpellReincarnation.letterText: The sacrifice has resurged with branches, trunk, and tree parts, destroying your altar. Upon its form is a wicked visage of the departed
LanguageData.Cults_SpellAuroraEffect.label: Aurora
LanguageData.Cults_SpellAuroraEffect.letterText: A magnificent aurora gracefully passes overhead
LanguageData.Cults_SpellNeedAHand.label: Need a Hand
LanguageData.Cults_SpellNeedAHand.letterText: One of the congregation finds, to their horror, that their body has been altered
LanguageData.Cults_SpellRatsInTheWalls.label: Rats in the Walls
LanguageData.Cults_SpellRatsInTheWalls.letterText: Scutting, scratching sounds hail the arrival of countless rats bursting through the floorboards
LanguageData.Cults_DebugSpawnCultPreacher.label: Debug: Spawn Cult Preacher
